Description.Text:
Location
The hotel is strategically located in the centre of the city of Ushuaia, 200 metres from the main avenue San Martin and just a few paces from the main restaurants and shops in the city.
Facilities
The hotel was renovated in 2009. The hotel features 15 accommodation units. A 24-hour check-out service is provided in the lobby. Amenities include a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a caf√© and a bar. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. A playroom is also among the amenities at the hotel. Bicycles can be left in the bicycle storage area. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee).
Rooms
All rooms feature central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access are also bookable. The accommodation units each feature a double bed. A safe is also available. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Internet access, a telephone and a TV are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a bath and a hairdryer.
Sports/Entertainment
The hotel's leisure facilities include massage treatments (for a fee).
Meals
The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B.
